February 26, 1959
Mr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
I have examined the statement of revenues and expenditures
for the several grants from the Ford Foundation to the National
Association of Educational Broadcasters for the period from
July 5, 1956 to the completion of the projects on February 20, 1959.
My examination was made in accordance with generally accepted
auditing standards, and accordingly included such tests of the
accounting records and such other auditing procedures as I considered
necessary in the circumstances.
In my opinion the accompanying statement presents fairly, in
conformity with generally accepted principles of accounting applied
on a consistent basis, the results of operation of the several grants
of the Ford Foundation to the National Association of Educational
Broadcasters for the period July 5, 1956 to February 20, 1959.
Signed/ Jack L. McGregor
Jack L. McGregor, Auditor
